comment: Bannon was leaking against ivanka and Jared. Bannon sucks but the fact trump fired him and not goldmansachs shows trump will take out the weakest group to save himself. PS we are his weakest supporters. Thats why trump is pivoting hard to blacks, hes trying to make up ground hes anticipating hell lose with us
